```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(gapminder)
glimpse(gapminder)
select(gapminder,country, year)
```
#Exercise 24.2
```{r}
gapminder |>
  filter((country == "Afghanistan" | country == "Albania" | country == "Algeria") & year > 1970, year < 1980) |>
  select(country, gdpPercap)

```
#Exercise 24.2.4
```{r}
gapminder |>
  filter(max(gdpPercap)) 

```
